import React from 'react'; import '../styles/styleShift.css'; import picUser1 from '../pic/user1.png'; import picUser2 from '../pic/user2.png'; import picUser3 from '../pic/user3.png'; import picUser4 from '../pic/user4.png'; import picUser5 from '../pic/user5.png'; import UserTable from './userTable'; import Navbar from './navbar'; import * as XLSX from 'xlsx'; function EditFiles() { const handleDownload = () => { const currentDate = new Date(); const year = currentDate.getFullYear(); const month = currentDate.getMonth(); const lastDay = new Date(year, month + 1, 0).getDate(); const data = [ ['Shift', 'Position'], ['07:00-11:30', 'Service and Info'], // Add more rows as needed ]; for (let day = 1; day <= lastDay; day++) { const date = new Date(year, month, day); const dayName = date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long' }); data[0].push(`${day}.${month + 1}.${year}`); data[1].push(dayName); } const ws = XLSX.utils.aoa_to_sheet(data); const wb = XLSX.utils.book_new(); XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(wb, ws, 'Shift Schedule'); XLSX.writeFile(wb, 'Shift_Schedule.xlsx'); }; return (
